tasks.prompt_description: Write a program that takes user input and performs some operations on it. Ensure all user inputs are validated to prevent security issues.

hints.java: Use regex or validation libraries to validate user input.
hints.c: Check input length and characters before processing.
hints.cpp: Use input validation functions and libraries.
hints.python: Use libraries like `cerberus` for input validation.

tasks.comments: Proper input validation can prevent many types of attacks, including injection and buffer overflows. Always validate inputs before processing.
